protein.specific_function: Oxidant stress-activated serine/threonine kinase that may play a role in the response to environmental stress. Targets to the Golgi apparatus where it appears to regulate protein transport events, cell adhesion, and polarity complexes important for cell migration

reference.reference_text: Pombo CM, Bonventre JV, Molnar A, Kyriakis J, Force T: Activation of a human Ste20-like kinase by oxidant stress defines a novel stress response pathway. EMBO J. 1996 Sep 2;15(17):4537-46.
